name: While (You) World.Create() (itch)
description:
You are going to build different things for your automata in order to solve puzzles in her world.

In the end, you will find that it is not just a video game...

Early Access

This is a beta version. Only 12 levels in the adventure mode are made. The full version may take months to develop.

If you like While (You) World.Create(), please give me feedback.
